name: HEAVY WEIGHT CLASSES
text: Weightlifting makes me feel powerful. Confident. My lifting shoes are my “power heels.” When I hit a big lift, I’m unstoppable.

name: INDOOR CYCLING CLASSES
text: Can help with weight loss. Depending on the intensity of your workout and your body weight, you can burn more than 600 calories.

name: BODY BUILDING CLASSES
text: The best position for your first bodybuilding contest is the audience. It makes little sense to get on stage without learning.

name: WEIGHT LOSS CLASSES
text: Take the next step on your weight loss journey. With these Skillshare classes, you can learn how to improve your meal planning skills.
